New email from "–ò–ª–∏—è" <notifications@github.com>
Subject: Re: [777genius/claude-notifications-go] docs: add custom example for ntfy.sh (PR #29)

777genius left a comment (777genius/claude-notifications-go#29)

Hey, thanks a lot for this PR! üôå

Seriously, great job ‚Äî ntfy.sh integration is something people have been asking about, and you nailed the documentation. Clear examples, step-by-step setup, Docker Compose config ‚Äî everything someone needs to get started right away.

This is genuinely useful stuff that will help a lot of people set up self-hosted notifications. Really appreciate you taking the time to put this together!

--
